data.title: Indiana Adjutant General
data.meta_description: The Adjutant General of Indiana is the commander of the Indiana National Guard. data.text:
The Adjutant General of Indiana is the commander of the Indiana National Guard. The Adjutant General (or 'TAG') is responsible for all state, non-federalized military and reports directly to the Governor of Indiana. Indiana's TAG is appointed by the governor and serves a term concurrent with the governor.[1] The Adjutant General must hold a rank of Brigadier General (BG) or higher.

The current Adjutant General is BG Courtney Carr.[2]

List of Adjutants General of Indiana[]

The following is a partial list of Adjutants General in Indiana:
